Definition: In this task you are given a sentence. You must judge whether there exist two consecutive words within the sentence with flipped orders, that is, whether the sentence will make sense and be correct if the order of two consecutive words changes. Label the instances as "Inversion" or "Original" based on your judgment.

Instead they would try to run, and not necessarily in the best direction.

Negative Examples.input: I turned to watch the tail lights of the Chevrolet disappear in the before downpour getting into the lift.
Negative Examples.explanation: "downpour" and "before" are two consecutive tokens that have been inverted so the output should be "Inversion".

Negative Examples.input: I hated even hearing that name now.
Negative Examples.explanation: This is an original sentence, without an order inversion, but your answer should just be "Original" or "Inversion".
